file_content.text: I'd say it's time to lock up all the valuables, but you already did.
Now there's a nice chunk of change. Let's go convert him to large denomination credits.
What was that? Pity? You had him!
That scaly freak so much as looks at me and I'm shooting him in the back.
Guess Vause wants a tomb with a view.
That guy was stocked with more substances than a spice mine.
The Jawa was referring to the Star of Coruscant. Could be a fortune in tech buried in there.
Nothing to show for that but second degree burns. Hope you're happy.
Whew, that was close. Gimme a sec to dry out or I'm gonna end up an ice sculpture.
Less talking, more running!
Can we maybe pick up the pace? Getting kinda woozy here.
Ahh, much better.
At least we know where Gradak's supposed to be now.
First we freeze, now we fry. Great.
That maniac took "having a screw loose" to a whole new level.
At least it's actually warm in here.
Why are we wasting our time babysitting these garbage collectors?
Well, we know none of these droids are here to keep the place clean.
We're really going along with the stranded sand rat's plan? Really.
Great, now what?
Hope he's right. The less time I spend here the better.
Knew I should have worn a thicker coat....
Why anyone'd want this ball of ice, I'll never know.
You fight, I'll cheer. Deal?
A Hutt once told me I'd end up in a place like this.
